title: Solar lights going green in Thailand solar power in Thailand check it out!

tasks.task: Unboxing and setup of solar-powered devices
subtasks: Remove packaging materials from solar panel and light fitting
Inspect the solar panel and light fitting components
Identify screws and battery placement for easy servicing
Plug in the solar panel and observe charging
Position the solar panel in direct sunlight for charging
Install the solar light fitting on the roof without tiles

tasks.task: Assembling and testing the solar-powered fan
subtasks: Open the packaging of the solar fan
Examine the fan's components and charging mechanism
Connect the solar panel to the fan's battery
Charge the fan's battery using the solar panel
Test the fan in various speeds (high and low)
Monitor fan operation throughout the day
